name: Space Invaders 555
description:
This is a 2D space shooter game that I've made with my friend's help.

It has four chapters (worlds), each with a different theme, mechanics, and bosses, and a custom BGM. It's not long (about 20 to 30 minutes), so please give it a try!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move spaceship
Space - Shoot
Esc - Pause
